page.title: 11GRAHAM SCHOOL,SCARBOROUGH
page.content: The Graham School has 62 full time teaching staff and 1 part time.Also circulating around the school are 38 other members of staff,(cleaning, secretarial and kitchen). It is a mixed school with 868 children not including the 237 fifth year. These are divided into 32 forms giving an average of 27 pupils per form. It has many different and varied classrooms. We have an A,B,C,G block, a Technical block, a music block, a science block, a drama black and an art block.The A,science and the art blocks each have 7 classrooms, and the B,C and Tech blocks each have 8 classrooms. All the rest have less than 7. The average size of the classrooms is L=9.89m, W=7.76m, H=3.37m. Altogther we have 57 classrooms but that is not including the prep rooms and offices.
